thread.title: Labour Cost Index (All Labour Costs): June 2015 quarter (Statistics New Zealand)
thread.title_full: Labour Cost Index (All Labour Costs): June 2015 quarter (Statistics New Zealand) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Labour Cost Index (All Labour Costs): June 2015 quarter (Statistics New Zealand)
text: ( Source : Statistics New Zealand ) From the June 2014 quarter to the June 2015 quarter: Labour costs increased 1.5 percent. Non-wage labour costs increased 1.0 percent. Annual leave and statutory holiday costs increased 1.6 percent.
